text: An doka ƙasƙanci a kansu a inda duk aka same su face da wani alkawari daga Allah, da alkawari daga mutane. Kuma sun koma da fushi daga Allah, kuma aka doka talauci a kansu. Wannan kuwa domin su, lalle sun kasance suna kafirta da ayoyin Allah, kuma suna kashe annabawa, ba da wani haƙƙi ba. Wannan kuwa domin saɓawar da suka yi ne, kuma sun kasance suna yin ta'adi
